autoBegin.description: Go straight into exam, without having to press the 'Begin' button

feedback.description: Shows the user whether they answered each frequency correctly.

feedbackDelay.description: Number of milliseconds to show feedback after the presentation before starting the next presentation. This field can be used even when `feedback` is set to `false`.

NumberOfPresentations.description: Number of presentations in an exam.

Level.description: Level of tones, set by calibration, in dB SPL

Channel.description: Which ear to use for the output. 0=Left, 1=Right, 2=Both.
